ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is what might have confused you.  Bard invis song will sometimes work against the undead in Unrest.  Its all a function of what level you are. When I went
ygData.messageBody:
Here is what might have confused you. Bard invis song will sometimes work
against the undead in Unrest. Its all a function of what level you are.
When I went to Unrest at 19th level, it didn't work against any of the
undead there at all. I went back in my 30s and almost all of the lower
level undead mobs couldn't see through it. But it will never work against
the undead in LGuk.

Galtin of E'ci


Ok, I had read conflicting reports that the invis song worked against the
undead. Guess not.

I was in Lower Guk with my ranger the other day, 45 people and about 3 of
them not anon.
